item.title: GNU on Windows (GoW) - Linux commands in Windows
item.description: For a long time the only way to launch Linux commands in Windows was with Cygwin. But Cygwin is rather bulky and can take a long time to download if you are on a slower Internet connection. As I’ve mentioned before, I love Linux for its stability and reliability. So I was looking for a simpler way to execute Linux commands in Windows, and found it! I present to you GNU on Windows also known as GoW).
